resize.headline: Browser window too small
resize.content: Please resize the browser to a larger size to continue the tour or close the tour.

cancel.headline: Tutorial cancelled
cancel.content: You have cancelled the tutorial. If you want to continue this tutorial at another time, click on <tt>Continue tutorial</tt> from the account menu.

clickHint.text: Click on the highlighted element to proceed with the tour.
